verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes:<s%> From the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7097>end,<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> Hazar <S%H2704>Enan<s%> at the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> (and they shall have their <S%H6285>sides<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> and <S%H3220>west<s%>), <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H836>Asher,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> even to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> even to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>

By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> shall be the <S%H8641>offering<s%> which you shall <S%H7311>offer,<s%> <S%H505>twenty<s%> - five thousand reeds in <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> and in <S%H753>length<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2506>portions,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side:<s%> and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall be in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

The <S%H8641>offering<s%> that you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> reeds in <S%H753>length,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth.<s%>

For <S%H3548>these,<s%> even for the priests, shall be the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>offering:<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3220>length,<s%> and toward the west <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> and toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> and toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length:<s%> and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

It shall be for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who are <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> who have <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4931>instruction,<s%> who <S%H8582>didn't<s%> go astray when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H8582>astray,<s%> as the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> went <S%H8582>astray.<s%>

It shall be to them an <S%H8642>offering<s%> from the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

<S%H5980>Answerable<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall have <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth:<s%> all the <S%H753>length<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

They shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> none of <S%H4171>it,<s%> nor exchange <S%H7225>it,<s%> nor shall the first fruits of the <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H5674>alienated;<s%> for it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> shall be for <S%H2455>common<s%> <S%H5892>use,<s%> for the city, for <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> and for <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

These shall be its <S%H4060>measures:<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and on the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

The <S%H5892>city<s%> shall have <S%H4054>suburbs:<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> and toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> and toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> and toward the <S%H3220>west<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

The <S%H3498>remainder<s%> in the <S%H753>length,<s%> <S%H5980>answerable<s%> to the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>offering,<s%> shall be <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6921>eastward,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3220>westward;<s%> and it shall be <S%H5980>answerable<s%> to the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>offering;<s%> and its <S%H8393>increase<s%> shall be for <S%H3899>food<s%> to those who <S%H5647>labor<s%> in the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
Those who <S%H5647>labor<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall cultivate <S%H5647>it.<s%>

All the <S%H8641>offering<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> by <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand:<s%> you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> <S%H7243>foursquare,<s%> with the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

The <S%H3498>residue<s%> shall be for the <S%H5387>prince,<s%> on the one side and on the other of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> and of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city;<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of the <S%H8641>offering<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H1366>border,<s%> and <S%H3220>westward<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> toward the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border,<s%> <S%H5980>answerable<s%> to the <S%H2506>portions,<s%> it shall be for the <S%H5387>prince:<s%> and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

Moreover from the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and from the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> being in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of that which is the <S%H5387>prince<s%>'s, between the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> it shall be for the <S%H5387>prince.<s%>
As for the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes:<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>
By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> one <S%H259>portion.<s%>

By the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be even from <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> to the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>Meribath<s%> <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H1419>Egypt,<s%> to the great <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

This is the <S%H776>land<s%> which you shall <S%H5307>divide<s%> by lot to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and these are their several <S%H4256>portions,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

These are the <S%H8444>exits<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> On the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> reeds by <S%H4060>measure;<s%>

and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be after the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H6828>northward:<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

At the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7969>reeds,<s%> and three <S%H8179>gates:<s%> even the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

At the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> reeds by <S%H4060>measure,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates:<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

At the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7969>reeds,<s%> with their three <S%H8179>gates:<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>
It shall be <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> reeds <S%H5439>around:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H3074>be,<s%> Yahweh is there.
